item.title: Blackstone’s Private Credit Line to Dropbox Raised to $2.7 Billion
item.description: Blackstone Inc. has expanded its private credit line for the file-sharing site, Dropbox Inc., to $2.7 billion nine months after striking the initial deal.

item.title: Blackstone’s Private Credit Line to Dropbox Raised to $2.7 Billion
item.description: Blackstone Inc. has expanded its private credit line for the file-sharing site, Dropbox Inc., to $2.7 billion nine months after striking the initial deal.
